VRSimulatorInputInterface
internal static
VRSimulatorInputInterface

Interface for calling native plugin functions to control the simulated XR Devices.

Functions
SetPrimaryState
[DllImport("VRSimulatorXRPlugin")]
internal static extern int SetPrimaryState(
bool left,
bool pressed
)

Sets the primary button state of the left or right controller of the XR Plugin.

Parameters
left
bool

decides if setting left (true) or right (false) controller

pressed
bool

state the button is set to
